text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump “We will not see diseases like the coronavirus come here. — Kaleigh McEnany, February 25th.

“you have 15 people, and the 15 within a couple days is going to be down to close to zero, that's a pretty good job we've done." Donald Trump Feb 27
